io.springlets.data.web.datatables

Class DatatablesColumns

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.springlets.data.web.datatables.DatatablesColumns

  • public class DatatablesColumns
extends Object
    Information about Datatables columns configuration: name, if it is searchable, ...
    Author:
    Cèsar Ordiñana at http://www.disid.com[DISID Corporation S.L.]
    See Also:
    https://datatables.net/manual/server-side
